properties.Text: Q7 Name of the head of the household with surname:
Q08 Mobile number of the cultivator/ relative (if landline, start with STD code)
Q9 Is there any female member having knowledge on natural farming?
Q10 If yes, name of the woman farmer (Request her to join the interview)
Q12 Serial number of the cultivator as per the listing schedule (Auto-populated)
Q17 Date of checking of Supervisor
Q18 Date of checking of R Supervisor
